mapper.select: select board_idx, b.member_idx, title, content, viewcnt, regdate, update_regdate, name ,(select count(*) from reply where b.board_idx=reply.board_idx) as re_count from board b inner join member m on b.member_idx = m.member_idx order by board_idx desc;
mapper.insert: insert into board (member_idx, title, content ) values(#{member_idx}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select board_idx, b.member_idx, title, content, viewcnt, regdate, update_regdate, name from board b inner join member m on b.member_idx = m.member_idx where board_idx=#{board_idx}
